title: The Lady Is For Turning
itunes:title: The Lady Is For Turning
description:
Less than a month into office and new Prime Minister Liz Truss is already on the back foot. Today her Chancellor was forced to ditch plans to scrap the top rate of income tax, just ten days after he unveiled the policy. Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker is in Birmingham at the Conservative Party conference with reaction from Secretary of State for Work and Pensions Chloe Smith, Institute of Economic Affairs Director General Mark Littlewood, and Bloomberg's Editor in Chief John Micklethwait.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
